'''Of Sun and Moon''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during ''[[The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent]]'', when the player switches between [[Dainichi Mikoshi/Mechanism|Whitenight and Evernight]] for the first time.
